name: Christmas Brickout
description:
Like it vote for us on greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=572739801

Help Santa get back the presents and save christmas from the evil-snow monsters in this brickout game

Features:

  • 30 levels
  • 3 Bosses

The full game will feature 60 levels, 6 bosses, co-op mode, boss rush mode and more.
